titles.title: Honoring the life of former Minority Leader of the House of Representatives, Robert Henry "Bob" Michel.
Honoring the life of former Minority Leader of the House of Representatives, Robert Henry "Bob" Michel.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Declares that the House of Representatives honors the life, achievements, and distinguished public service of Robert H. "Bob" Michel, former Republican Minority Leader of the House of Representatives.
